golad.lib.impl

Class DefaultAbstractMoveFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • golad.lib.impl.AbstractMoveFactory
      • golad.lib.impl.DefaultAbstractMoveFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoveFactory

    public abstract class DefaultAbstractMoveFactory
extends AbstractMoveFactory
    An abstract implementation of an AbstractMoveFactory, supplying the Board to validate on and the player to validate for from internal variables.
    Author:
    Megacrafter127

        public DefaultAbstractMoveFactory(Board board,
                          CellState player)
                           throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                  NullPointerException
        Creates a new DefaultAbstractMoveFactory.
        Parameters:
        board - The Board to validate on
        player - The Player to validate for
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerColor

        public CellState getPlayerColor()
        Description copied from interface: MoveFactory
        Returns the CellState representing an alive cell owned by the player that is given this MoveFactory. Returns null if this MoveFactory is given to multiple players or has no associated player.
        Returns:
        the CellState representing an allied cell
